ResearchProjectDef.label: Gene-seed creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of genetic augmentations, suitable for creation of Proto-Astartes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stasis Resurrection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the medical surgery required to bring back pawns from self-induced stasis.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gene-seed purification
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of more stable astartes, by purifying and futher developing gene-seed creation process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced protein substitution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to craft matrices with the use of any flesh, and not just human.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gene-seed perfection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of enhanced astartes, by futher improving and refining the gene-seed creation process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Firstborn gene-seed extraction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the surgery to extract gene-seeds from a fully grown progenoid gland of a space marine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primaris gene-seed extracton
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the surgery to extract gene-seeds from a fully grown progenoid gland of a Primaris marine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rubicon Surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Rubicon Surgery, allowing Firstborn to be reborn as Primaris.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Custodes creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of Custodes - a long costly process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primarch Project
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the creation of Primarchs - a very long and costly process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legion Astartes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the medical surgery required to create legion material from a primarchs genetic code. Requires the primarch to have legion specific genes. Addional successor legion material may become craftable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mk I Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants access to STCs enabling the manufacture of Mk I Power Armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mk VII Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants access to STCs enabling the manufacture of Mk VII Power Armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mk X Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants access to advanced STCs enabling the manufacture of Mk X Power Armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Proto Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants access to STCs enabling the manufacture of old Proto weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Astartes Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grants access to STCs enabling the manufacture of essential Astartes armaments.
